channel.title: Hunger Games [Minigame- not full server] Release
channel.description:
[video=youtube;NU5A4lFX-d4]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NU5A4lFX-d4[/video]
I'd say about 80% complete. Just a few kinks to work out and the game will be perfect. New minigame coming out right after this one is perfected!

item.title: Hunger Games [Minigame- not full server] Release
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

It seems like everybody dies really fast at the start…sorry for bring this into this, but make it similar to community minecraft hunger games…grace period and you might want to add stuff to the area to make it more interesting and stuff or find a different area that is more of a challenge like forest or something like that, but its a great and basic idea…great job

Read full topic
item.source: Hunger Games [Minigame- not full server] Release

item.title: Hunger Games [Minigame- not full server] Release
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Drimestic Comics, post:14, topic:530558”]You can’t be serious. :palm:

This is a RUNESCAPE Private server. If you want to make a Hungers Game game, learn to make a Flash Game.[/quote]
Erm, this is a minigame?

Read full topic

item.description:
@djzone wrote:

Thanks alot guys, It is multi now, and yes you can use the chest up to 5 times.

item.title: Hunger Games [Minigame- not full server] Release
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:10, topic:530558”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=649318.msg4365710#msg4365710 date=1379635645]

hasn’t there been multiple(?) hunger-game based mini-games?

Yeah, and they aren’t good enough.

I think me (and dj) are offended.
[/quote]

I doubt I even saw yours. I’m on rune-server more than moparscape.[/quote]
I’m on rune-server also!!

But im messin with ya

Read full topic

item.title: Hunger Games [Minigame- not full server] Release
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

Fails:

hasn’t there been multiple(?) hunger-game based mini-games?

Yeah, and they aren’t good enough. I think I could base a whole server on the hunger games book. Storyline, quests, games, etc.

Really wish I didn’t have to use another person’s computer so I can make one :mad:

Read full topic
